name: tool
description: The Tool component displays AI tool execution information with collapsible header, content, and details sections. Features state-based badges and shadcn-svelte Collapsible integration for showing tool usage, parameters, and results in AI responses.

files.content:
<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$UTILS$";
	import { Collapsible } from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/collapsible/index.js";
	import type { ToolPart } from "./types.js";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";
	import { setContext } from "svelte";

	let {
		toolPart,
		defaultOpen = false,
		open = $bindable(defaultOpen),
		class: className,
		children,
	}: {
		toolPart: ToolPart;
		defaultOpen?: boolean;
		open?: boolean;
		class?: string;
		children: Snippet;
	} = $props();

	// Provide toolPart to child components via context
	setContext("toolPart", toolPart);
</script>

<Collapsible
	bind:open
	class={cn("border-border mt-3 overflow-hidden rounded-lg border", className)}
>
	{@render children()}
</Collapsible>

<script lang="ts">
	import type { ToolPart } from "./types.js";
	import { Tool, ToolHeader, ToolContent, ToolDetails } from "./index.js";

	let {
		toolPart,
		defaultOpen = false,
		class: className,
	}: {
		toolPart: ToolPart;
		defaultOpen?: boolean;
		class?: string;
	} = $props();
</script>

<Tool {toolPart} {defaultOpen} class={className}>
	<ToolHeader />
	<ToolContent>
		<ToolDetails />
	</ToolContent>
</Tool>
{#snippet child({ props })} {/snippet}

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$UTILS$";
	import { CollapsibleContent } from "$COMPONENTS$/ui/collapsible/index.js";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	let {
		class: className,
		children,
	}: {
		class?: string;
		children: Snippet;
	} = $props();
</script>

<CollapsibleContent
	class={cn(
		"border-border border-t",
		"data-[state=closed]:animate-collapsible-up data-[state=open]:animate-collapsible-down overflow-hidden",
		className
	)}
>
	{@render children()}
</CollapsibleContent>

{#if input && Object.keys(input).length > 0}

Input

{#each Object.entries(input) as [key, value]}
{key}: {formatValue(value)}
{/each}
{/if} {#if output}

Output

{formatValue(output)}
{/if} {#if state === "output-error" && errorText}

Error

{errorText}
{/if} {#if state === "input-streaming"}
Processing tool call...
{/if} {#if toolCallId}
Call ID: {toolCallId}
{/if}

{#if state === "input-streaming"} Processing {:else if state === "input-available"} Ready {:else if state === "output-available"} Completed {:else if state === "output-error"} Error {:else} Pending {/if}
